all datasets.achieves: BioBERT achieves higher scores than BERT

on.from sentence: On the other hand, BioBERT achieves higher scores than BERT on all the datasets.
BioBERT outperformed the state-of-the-art models on six out of nine datasets, and BioBERT v1.1 (+ PubMed) outperformed the state-of-the-art models by 0.62 in terms of micro averaged F1 score.

RE results.achieved: BERT achieved better performance than the state-of-the-art model

CHEMPROT dataset.from sentence: The RE results of each model are shown in Table 7. BERT achieved better performance than the state-of-the-art model on the CHEMPROT dataset, which demonstrates its effectiveness in RE.

RE results.achieved: BioBERT achieved the highest F1 scores

2 out of 3 biomedical datasets.from sentence: The RE results of each model are shown in Table 7. Also, BioBERT achieved the highest F1 scores on 2 out of 3 biomedical datasets.

in terms of.from sentence: BioBERT outperformed the state-of-the-art models on six out of nine datasets, and BioBERT v1.1 (+ PubMed) outperformed the state-of-the-art models by 0.62 in terms of micro averaged F1 score.

higher F1 score.obtained: BioBERT v1.0 (+ PubMed) obtained a higher F1 score (2.80 higher) than the state-of-the-art models

RE results.from sentence: The RE results of each model are shown in Table 7. On average (micro), BioBERT v1.0 (+ PubMed) obtained a higher F1 score (2.80 higher) than the state-of-the-art models.

higher micro averaged MRR score.obtained: BERT obtained a higher micro averaged MRR score (7.0 higher) than the state-of-the-art models.
higher micro averaged MRR score.from sentence: The QA results are shown in Table 8. BERT obtained a higher micro averaged MRR score (7.0 higher) than the state-of-the-art models.

all versions of BioBERT.from sentence: The QA results are shown in Table 8. All versions of BioBERT significantly outperformed BERT and the state-of-the-art models, and in particular, BioBERT v1.1 (+ PubMed) obtained a strict accuracy of 38.77, a lenient accuracy of 53.81 and a mean reciprocal rank score of 44.77, all of which were micro averaged

new state-of-the-art performance.from sentence: On all the biomedical QA datasets, BioBERT achieved new state-of-the-art performance in terms of MRR.
